instructions.title: Before you start...
instructions.subtitle: Please read these important guidelines to ensure you have the best experience with our mental health support service.

card1.title: Talbinah Bot does not provide direct medical treatment
card1.subtitle: Our AI assistant is designed to provide emotional support and guidance, but it cannot replace professional medical care or therapy.

card2.title: Talbinah Bot is not for emergencies or critical situations
card2.subtitle: If you are experiencing a mental health crisis or having thoughts of self-harm, please contact emergency services immediately.

card3.title: User age requirements
card3.subtitle: This service is intended for users aged 18 and above. Professional conduct and respectful communication are expected at all times.

card4.title: Privacy and confidentiality
card4.subtitle: Your conversations are private and secure. We use industry-standard encryption to protect your personal information and mental health data.

card5.title: Service limitations
card5.subtitle: While our AI can provide valuable support, it has limitations. For complex mental health issues, we recommend consulting with a qualified mental health professional.

home.selfCareMessage: Every moment you care for yourself... is a true investment in your future.

descriptions.bookAppointment: With a single click, book your session and start your recovery journey with the best counselors and mental health specialists.
descriptions.podcast: Presented by mental health experts, discussing topics to support your journey towards better mental well-being.
descriptions.supportGroups: Your safe space to interact, share experiences, and seek support in a community that cares about your mental health.
descriptions.talbinaBot: Helps you identify your issue and guides you to the most suitable doctor.
descriptions.mentalHealthScale: With a single touch, understand your mental state accurately and clearly. This comprehensive assessment helps you track your emotions and better understand your needs, starting your journey towards inner balance and true comfort. üåø
descriptions.UrgentAppointment: Read simple articles by specialists that explain psychological topics in an easy and relatable way, so you can understand yourself better and deal with it comfortably
descriptions.Articles: If your condition requires immediate intervention, book an urgent appointment with a qualified specialist and start your recovery steps right away.
